mapper.select: SELECT u.USER_NICKNAME AS nickname, COALESCE(i.IMAGE_URL, '') AS profileImageUrl FROM tb_user u LEFT JOIN tb_image i ON i.IMAGE_ID = u.IMAGE_ID WHERE u.USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_image (IMAGE_ORIGINAL_NAME, IMAGE_URL, IMAGE_NAME, IMAGE_TYPE, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_BY, UPDATED_DATE, UPDATED_BY) VALUES (#{imageOriginalName}, #{imageUrl}, #{imageName}, #{imageType, jdbcType=INTEGER}, NOW(), #{createdBy}, NOW(), #{updatedBy})
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_user SET IMAGE_ID = #{imageId} WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
